channel.title: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!
channel.description:
Welcome! :)
This community exists to support the development of games.
If you are already familiar with such, fantastic! There are many boards here for where you can contribute your skills and help other members. If you really don't know how to make a game, also fantastic. We'll show you how. ;)
Bear in mind this forum is still part of the Moparisthebest.com community. The [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342270.0.html]global community rules[/url] still apply here. Boards may have additional guidelines you may have to abide by, but those will only exist if there is a sticky in the board explaining them.
Otherwise, have fun and happy contributing. :)

item.title: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

The reason this community probably won’t get a rep reset is the same reason MoparCraft didn’t get a rep reset. There’s two rep categories in SMF by default. Positive and negative. If you ever look at who changed your rep, who may see something similar

(+10/-200)
MITB is positive rep, MoparScape is negative rep. MITB would have to add another rep category to have separate rep on these forums.

Read full topic
item.source: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!

item.title: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:7, topic:411280”]Reset the Rep
Maybe it can mean something here lol.[/quote]

I somewhat agree with this, although I don’t have much rep to show for myself as it is, we could start this new community with it reset. Besides, I don’t think many people will be coming here that are idiots and rep whores. I see this as a new community to learn and share real Java projects.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Coelho, post:4, topic:411280”]Looking good!

EDIT: If we are say making a runescape framework, however we’d like to discuss a good networking method, scheduling method, or etc, could we discuss that on these forums? Just a question, because it overall does relate to game development and is a good future reference.[/quote]

It’s sort of relevant, but might fit better on MoparScape or MITB.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to the Mopar Game Development Community!
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

Looking good!

EDIT: If we are say making a runescape framework, however we’d like to discuss a good networking method, scheduling method, or etc, could we discuss that on these forums? Just a question, because it overall does relate to game development and is a good future reference.

item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

I’m so happy this is actually up. Ive enjoyed this community and I don’t like to go to others when this community doesn’t support what I’m looking for/or doing. Now that we have this section, I have a place that I much better fit in.

Read full topic
